data.text: @curtislemansky It was nearly identical to the petition from Informed Choice in January...and same talking points from the board. We may file a similar but different petition.
@CLofWashington Thank you. Kind of figured considering their last discussion about it.
@curtislemansky They did not accept the petition.
@CLofWashington Do you know what the vote on this item ended up being?
@JennieCourtney1 Totally agree. We will see what he does at the April meeting. If he doesn't go with the TAG recommendation I think a call to action will be in order.

@CLofWashington I still think Mr. Pendergrass shouldn’t have been on both TAG and BOH. Conflict of interest. He should recuse himself from BOH. One person should not  be able to influence that many people on a life changing decision for parents. My opinion.

Here's today's agenda. *NOTE: the TAG review of Covid shots is not happening until the APRIL meeting

https://t.co/Tu6Mqhyd5j
